attributes.action: Reduce the salary of the Home Secretary to the National Minimum Wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jacqui Smith prevented an elected Dutch MP from entering the UK today.  This MP intended to attend a screening of a film, for which the maker has already died.  The film is not unlawful and is publicly available.

Jacqui Smith banned this MP to placate muslim voters, not realising that she has alienated English voters.  She is a divisive, racially insensitive bureaucrat with no respect for our traditions of freedom of speech.  She is therefore unsuitable to serve in Parliament, let alone to serve as a minister in a democracy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
